code: export function getGroups(){const data=localStorage.getItem("note-groups");return data?JSON.parse(data):[];}export function saveGroups(groups){localStorage.setItem("note-groups",JSON.stringify(groups));}export function getNotes(groupName){const data=localStorage.getItem("notes-".concat(groupName));return data?JSON.parse(data):[];}export function saveNotes(groupName,notes){localStorage.setItem("notes-".concat(groupName),JSON.stringify(notes));}
